articles.title: As Heatwaves Bake South Asia, Study Says Temperature Reached "Extremely Dangerous" Level - NDTV
articles.description: In the study, researchers warned of the effects of climate change-induced rise in temperature.
articles.content:
The study warned about extreme temperatures in India and other Southeast Asian countries.
Countries in South and Southeast Asia baked in record-breaking heatwaves in April with the temperature risin… [+1941 chars]
